divs: Sighting DetailsOn 09-18-02, at approx. 1400 hrs, witnesses were inside of a lake mobile homejust offshore of Toledo Bend Lake, when witness# 1 glanced out of a window tothe residence and noted an approx. 8 foot round circle in the lake. Witness #1called to witness #2 and both went on shore to closer observe the anomaly. There were no other people or boats observed by the witnesses in the area. Eventhough it was raining hard and the wind blew out of the south, the circle didnot dissipate. Also, waves from the wind were noted by the witneses to beoutside the of center and outer edges of the circle, however, the circle itselfremained smooth and undisturbed. Witness #1 took 3 digital photos of thisanamoly, and both witnesses observed the circle slowly elongate and disappearafter about 30 minutes. Note: Witnesses had heard jet aircraft and ahelocopter in the area the day before, which was unusual for the area.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hemphill
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw unusual water circle in lake
